name: APPLE iPhone SE
size: 11.94 cm (4.7 inch) Retina HD Display
Description: The APPLE iPhone SE combines classic design with powerful performance. It features a 4.7 inch Retina HD display with a resolution of 1334 x 750 pixels. The device is powered by the A13 Bionic chip, which ensures smooth performance and responsiveness. Its compact form factor makes it easy to handle and carry.

name: APPLE iPhone I3
size: 10.94 cm (4.8 inch) Retina HD Display
Description: The APPLE iPhone I3 features an elegant blue finish and a compact 4.8 inch Retina HD display. It is equipped with a 10MP rear camera for stunning photos and a 7MP front camera for selfies. The device is designed for users seeking a balance of style and functionality in their daily tasks.

name: APPLE iPhone 17 Pro
size: 11.96 cm (5.7 inch) Retina HD Display

The 7MP front camera is perfect for high-quality selfies and video calls, making it ideal for social media enthusiasts.
